20110131013621.000|20110131013623.000|CC1|OUR HOTEL TONIGHT.

20110131013625.000|20110131013627.000|CC1|AIRPORT INTO CAIRO AND AT FIRST 
20110131013627.000|20110131013630.000|CC1|IT WAS EERILY QUIET.            
20110131013630.000|20110131013631.000|CC1|BUT EVERY HUNDRED YARDS OR SO,  
20110131013631.000|20110131013634.000|CC1|WE WERE STOPPED.                
20110131013634.000|20110131013635.000|CC1|WE'RE DRIVING FROM THE AIRPORT  
20110131013635.000|20110131013637.000|CC1|INTO TOWN.                      
20110131013637.000|20110131013638.000|CC1|IT'S PRACTICALLY DESERTED.
